summary.span: 提供用于使用 Windows 2000 的协作数据对象 (CDOSYS) 消息组件来发送消息的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods for sending messages using the Collaboration Data Objects for Windows 2000 (CDOSYS) message component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过内置于 Microsoft Windows 2000 或通过任意 SMTP 服务器的 SMTP 邮件服务传递该邮件。The mail message can be delivered either through the SMTP mail service built into Microsoft Windows 2000 or through an arbitrary SMTP server. 命名空间中的类型可在 ASP.NET 或任何托管应用程序中使用。Types in the namespace can be used from ASP.NET or from any managed application. 如果未设置 属性，则默认情况下邮件在 Windows 2000 系统上排队，确保调用程序不会阻止网络流量。If the property is not set, mail is by default queued on a Windows 2000 system, ensuring that the calling program does not block network traffic. 如果设置了 属性，则邮件将直接传递到指定的服务器。If the property is set, the mail is delivered directly to the specified server. ## Examples 下面的示例可以编译为一个控制台应用程序，该应用程序用于通过命令行发送电子邮件。The following example can be compiled to a console application that is used to send email from a command line. 如果将示例编译到名为 Send-mailmessage 的文件，请使用可执行文件发送电子邮件，如下所示：If you compile the example to a file named MailMessage.exe, use the executable file to send email as follows: ``` MailMessage to@contoso.com from@contoso.com test hello ``` [!code-csharp[System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail/CS/systemwebmailsmtpmail.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail/VB/systemwebmailsmtpmail.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你的本地 SMTP 服务器（包含在 Windows 2000 和 Windows Server 2003 中）位于阻止任何直接 SMTP 流量（通过端口25）的防火墙后面，你将需要了解网络上是否有可用于将 SMTP 消息中继到 t 的智能主机Internet。If your local SMTP server (included with Windows 2000 and Windows Server 2003) is behind a firewall that blocks any direct SMTP traffic (through port 25), you will need to find out if there is a smart host available on your network that is allowed to relay SMTP messages to the Internet. 智能主机是有权限将传出电子邮件从内部 SMTP 服务器直接中继到 Internet 的 SMTP 服务器。A smart host is an SMTP server with the permissions to relay outgoing email messages directly to the Internet from internal SMTP servers. 智能主机应能够同时连接到内部网络和 Internet，以便作为电子邮件网关。A smart host should be able to simultaneously connect to both the internal network and the Internet in order to work as the email gateway. ## Examples [!code-csharp[System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail.SmtpServer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail.SmtpServer/CS/systemwebmailsmtpmailsmtpserver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail.SmtpServer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail.SmtpServer/VB/systemwebmailsmtpmailsmtpserver.vb#1)]
